description: Detects MSI package installation from suspicious locations
false_positives: Some false positives may occur depending on the environnement
name: MSI Installation From Suspicious Locations
query: (winlog.channel:"Application" AND (Provider_Name:"MsiInstaller" AND winlog.event_id:("1040" OR "1042") AND Data:(*\\Users\\Public\\* OR *\\PerfLogs\\* OR *\\Desktop\\* OR *C\:\\Windows\\TEMP\\* OR *\\\\\*)) AND (NOT ((Data:*\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\WinGet\\*) OR (Data:*C\:\\Windows\\TEMP\\UpdHealthTools.msi*))))
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali
